nativeSentence: The capital of France is Paris.
explanation: Paris is the capital and largest city of France.

sentence: Water _____ at 100 degrees Celsius at sea level.
nativeSentence: Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius at sea level.
explanation: At standard atmospheric pressure, water boils at 100°C (212°F).

sentence: The _____ is the largest planet in our solar system.
nativeSentence: Jupiter is the largest planet in our solar system.
explanation: Jupiter has more than twice the mass of all other planets combined.

sentence: Photosynthesis allows plants to convert _____ into energy.
nativeSentence: Photosynthesis allows plants to convert sunlight into energy.
explanation: Plants use sunlight, water, and CO₂ to produce glucose and oxygen.

sentence: The Great Wall of China was built to _____ against invasions.
nativeSentence: The Great Wall of China was built to protect against invasions.
explanation: It was constructed over centuries to defend northern borders.
